title: Cover Story: Workers Press for Power
itunes:title: Cover Story: Workers Press for Power
description:
This week's Cover Story for Bloomberg Businessweek: 'Workers Press for Power in Rare Advance for U.S. Labor Movement'

Read by Bloomberg's Mark Leydorf.

Along with the Great Resignation and #Striketober, jobless Americans are fighting for unemployment reform that could translate into lasting leverage

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
